main_definition: A picture refers to an image or representation of something, typically created through drawing, painting, photography, or digital means.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An actual physical image captured by a camera or other device
meanings_and_examples.example: The family gathered around the living room to admire the beautiful picture of their vacation taken last summer.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A visual representation, such as an illustration in books or on paper
meanings_and_examples.example: I found a detailed picture of the animal in my biology textbook that helped me understand its features better.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An expression or metaphor used to describe a situation or concept
meanings_and_examples.example: When I said 'the whole situation is out of this world,' I meant it was very unusual and surprising, not literally happening in outer space.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A graphic representation of statistical data, typically using charts or graphs
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher displayed a picture showing the students' test scores as a bar chart to make it easier for them to understand their performance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An image or visual depiction in one's mind that represents something abstract, such as an idea or emotion
meanings_and_examples.example: She described her vision of the future city as a picture filled with green parks and modern architecture.
